divs: Sighting DetailsHi, it's me (name deleted)fg who reported over thirty three sightings last year from June 27th through November 3 when things waned a bit. Anyway, I was with a friend outside my back yard kind of talking about the kinds of sightings I experienced when at exactly 1:13am a star appeared in the northwestern sky and moved somewhat quickly to the east and before it went into a constellation it got brighter and then disappeared. After seeing so many sighting all my life I recognized it as my celestial friends. I actually felt glad to see them.
Summary: Star appears in the northwestern sky, moves eastward, gets briter and then disappears
trends: There have been 39 other sightings in Redding
There were no other sightings in Redding on or around June 18th 2011
